Class Logger

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.board.Printable
it.polimi.ingsw.network.utils.Logger
public class Logger extends Printable
Used for fancy logging in the console with colors :D.

    • ERROR

      public static void ERROR(String msg, String errorType)
      Prints an error message on the console with the [ERROR] tag.
      Parameters:
      msg - the error message to print.
      errorType - the error type of the message.

    • INFO

      public static void INFO(String msg)
      Prints an informative message on the console with the [INFO] tag.

    • WARNING

    • GAME_LOG

      public static void GAME_LOG(String msg, String connectionName)
      Prints a game action message on the console with the [GAME LOG] tag and specifying which player made that action.
      Parameters:
      msg - the message containing the game action to print.
      connectionName - the nickname of the player who made the action.
